tech_news.title: Indie Game Awards disqualify Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 after generative AI controversy - Notebookcheck
tech_news.description: According to a statement issued by the Indie Game Awards, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been stripped of both awards it won. This decision came after producer François Meurisse confirmed the use of generative AI in the game’s development.
